Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature and Governor to enact Assembly A: 4199, to require all school buses to be equipped with safety belts and to require the use of safety belts on school buses.
Items.MatterName: Require all school buses to be equipped with safety belts (A.4199)

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the installation of a stop sign or traffic control signal at every intersection immediately adjacent to any high school or other school below high school level in New York City.
Items.MatterName: Installation of a stop sign or traffic control signal at every intersection immediately adjacent to any high school or other school below high school level in NYC.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to Christopher’s law.

A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring air-conditioning on any bus or other motor vehicle transporting a child with a disability to and from school.
Items.MatterName: Requiring air-conditioning on all buses or other motor vehicles engaged in the business of transporting children with disabilities to and from school.

Items.Title: A Local Law To amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the placement of two-way radios or cellular phones on school buses.
Items.MatterName: Two-way radios or cellular phones on school buses.

Items.Title: A Local Law To amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the placement of two-way radios or cellular phones on school buses.
Items.MatterName: Two-way radios or cellular phones on school buses.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring air-conditioning on any bus or other motor vehicle transporting a child with a disability to and from school.
Items.MatterName: Requiring air-conditioning on all buses or other motor vehicles engaged in the business of transporting children with disabilities to and from school.
